resources.string: Customise this counter\'s home screen card

Counters is an app that lets you create simple counters to track pretty much anything !
Features: - Multiple counters - Counters can automatically reset every day / week / month - Works with Material You (changes colour based on your wallpaper or theme) - Synchronises with Health Connect (Google Fit, Samsung Health and others) - No ads, tracking or paid content - Works offline
Track habits, workout progress, medication and improve your productivity !
